summary.span: 提供一組方法和屬性，可協助偵錯程式碼。

span.span: Provides a set of methods and properties that help debug your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您使用中的方法類別列印偵錯資訊，請檢查您的邏輯，判斷提示，您可以讓您的程式碼更穩固而不會影響效能和程式碼的大小傳送產品。If you use methods in the class to print debugging information and check your logic with assertions, you can make your code more robust without impacting the performance and code size of your shipping product. 這個類別會提供方法來顯示對話方塊中，並發出將一律失敗的判斷提示。This class provides methods to display an dialog box, and to emit an assertion that will always fail. 這個類別會提供寫入方法中的下列差異： ， ，和。This class provides write methods in the following variations: , , and . 和類別提供方法以動態方式控制追蹤輸出。The and classes provide means to dynamically control the tracing output. 您可以修改這些參數的值不需要重新編譯您的應用程式。You can modify the values of these switches without recompiling your application. 如需使用組態檔來設定參數資訊，請參閱類別和[追蹤參數](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md)主題。For information on using the configuration file to set a switch, see the class and the [Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md) topic. 您可以新增自訂追蹤輸出的目標執行個體，或移除執行個體從集合。You can customize the tracing output's target by adding instances to or removing instances from the collection. 集合由兩者共用和類別; 加入其中一個類別的追蹤接聽程式將接聽程式加入至兩者。The collection is shared by both the and the classes; adding a trace listener to either class adds the listener to both. 根據預設，類別就會發出追蹤輸出。By default, the class emits trace output. > [!NOTE] > 加入追蹤接聽程式，集合可能會造成追蹤，時擲回例外狀況，如果追蹤接聽程式所使用的資源無法使用。Adding a trace listener to the collection can cause an exception to be thrown while tracing, if a resource used by the trace listener is not available. 條件和擲回的例外狀況取決於追蹤接聽項，且無法列舉本主題中。The conditions and the exception thrown depend on the trace listener and cannot be enumerated in this topic. 可能很有用呼叫方法`try` / `catch`區塊偵測和處理來自追蹤接聽程式的任何例外狀況。It may be useful to place calls to the methods in `try`/`catch` blocks to detect and handle any exceptions from trace listeners. 您可以修改的層級的縮排使用方法或屬性。You can modify the level of indentation using the method or the property. 若要修改的縮排的間距，請使用屬性。To modify the indent spacing, use the property. 您可以指定是否自動在每次寫入後清除輸出緩衝區，藉由設定屬性`true`。You can specify whether to automatically flush the output buffer after each write by setting the property to `true`. 若要設定和如，您可以編輯組態檔對應到您的應用程式的名稱。To set the and for , you can edit the configuration file corresponding to the name of your application. 組態檔應該格式化，如下列範例所示。The configuration file should be formatted as shown in the following example. ```xml ``` 屬性會套用至方法的。The attribute is applied to the methods of . 支援的編譯器忽略呼叫這些方法，除非 「 偵錯 」 定義為條件式編譯符號。Compilers that support ignore calls to these methods unless "DEBUG" is defined as a conditional compilation symbol. 請參閱編譯器的文件，以判斷是否支援，以及定義條件式編譯符號的語法。Refer to a compiler's documentation to determine whether is supported and the syntax for defining a conditional compilation symbol. > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Studio C# 和 Visual Basic 專案中，依預設，[偵錯] 條件式編譯符號定義偵錯組建，而"TRACE"符號的同時進行偵錯和發行的組建定義。In Visual Studio C# and Visual Basic projects, by default, the "DEBUG" conditional compilation symbol is defined for debug builds, and the "TRACE" symbol is defined for both debug and release builds. 如需如何停用此行為，請參閱 Visual Studio 文件。For information about how to disable this behavior, see the Visual Studio documentation. 如需 Visual c + + 中的條件式偵錯資訊，請參閱[Debug 類別 (C + + /CLI)](/cpp/dotnet/debug-class-cpp-cli)。For information about conditional debugging in Visual C++, see [Debug Class (C++/CLI)](/cpp/dotnet/debug-class-cpp-cli). 若要定義"DEBUG"條件式編譯符號在 C# 中，加入`/d:DEBUG`編譯器命令列選項，當您編譯程式碼使用命令列，或新增`#define DEBUG`加入您的檔案頂端。To define the "DEBUG" conditional compilation symbol in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` option to the compiler command line when you compile your code using a command line, or add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，加入`/d:DEBUG=True`編譯器命令列選項，或新增`#Const DEBUG=True`檔案。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:DEBUG=True` option to the compiler command line or add `#Const DEBUG=True` to the file. ## Examples 下列範例會使用表示的開頭和結尾程式的執行。The following example uses to indicate the beginning and end of a program's execution. 此範例也會使用和區別追蹤輸出。The example also uses and to distinguish the tracing output. [!code-cpp[Classic Debug Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Debug Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Debug Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，方法只適用於偵錯組建。By default, the method works only in debug builds. 使用方法，如果您想要執行判斷提示，發行組建。Use the method if you want to do assertions in release builds. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Managed 程式碼中的判斷提示](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code)。For more information, see [Assertions in Managed Code](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code). > [!IMPORTANT] > `Assert`方法不適用於[!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)]應用程式。The `Assert` methods are not available for [!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)] apps. 一般而言，方法用來在程式開發期間識別出邏輯錯誤。Typically, the method is used to identify logic errors during program development. 評估條件。 evaluates the condition. 如果結果為`false`，它會傳送失敗訊息給集合。If the result is `false`, it sends a failure message to the collection. 您可以自訂此行為，藉由新增，或移除，集合。You can customize this behavior by adding a to, or removing one from, the collection. 當應用程式在使用者介面模式下執行時，它會顯示訊息方塊，顯示帶有檔案和行號的呼叫堆疊。When the application runs in user interface mode, it displays a message box that shows the call stack with file and line numbers. 訊息方塊包含三個按鈕：**中止**，**重試**，和**忽略**。The message box contains three buttons: **Abort**, **Retry**, and **Ignore**. 按一下**中止**按鈕結束應用程式。Clicking the **Abort** button terminates the application. 按一下**重試**如果您的應用程式正在執行中偵錯工具，或詢問您是否要開啟偵錯工具，如果不是傳送至偵錯工具中的程式碼。Clicking **Retry** sends you to the code in the debugger if your application is running in a debugger, or offers to open a debugger if it is not. 按一下**忽略**會繼續進行下一個指令碼中。Clicking **Ignore** continues with the next instruction in the code. > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 應用程式不支援強制回應對話方塊，讓它們的行為相同的使用者介面模式和非使用者介面模式。 apps do not support modal dialog boxes, so they behave the same in user interface mode and non-user interface mode. 將訊息寫入到使用中的追蹤接聽程式在偵錯模式中，或在發行模式中寫入任何訊息。The message is written to the active trace listeners in debugging mode, or no message is written in release mode. > [!NOTE] > 訊息方塊的顯示取決於是否存在。The display of the message box depends on the presence of the . 如果不在集合，訊息方塊不會顯示。If the is not in the collection, the message box is not displayed. 可以移除[<清除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)、 [<移除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)，或藉由呼叫方法屬性 (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`)。The can be removed by the [<clear>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), the [<remove>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), or by calling the method on the property (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`). 您可以變更的行為對應至您的應用程式名稱的組態檔中。You can change the behavior of the in the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此檔案中，您可以啟用和停用判斷提示訊息方塊或設定屬性。In this file, you can enable and disable the assert message box or set the property. 組態檔的格式應該如下：The configuration file should be formatted as follows: ```xml ``` ## Examples 下列範例會建立陣列的索引、 執行某項動作來設定索引的值，然後呼叫確認索引值有效。The following example creates an index for an array, performs some action to set the value of the index, and then calls to confirm that the index value is valid. 如果不是有效的輸出呼叫堆疊。If it is not valid, outputs the call stack. [!code-cpp[Classic Debug.Assert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug.Assert Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Debug.Assert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug.Assert Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Debug.Assert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug.Assert Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用.NET framework 物件的值轉換成它的文字表示，並將該表示內嵌在字串中。This method uses the of the .NET Framework to convert the value of an object to its text representation and embed that representation in a string. 產生的字串傳送至集合。The resulting string is sent to the collection. 根據預設，方法只適用於偵錯組建。By default, the method works only in debug builds. 使用方法，如果您想要執行判斷提示，發行組建。Use the method if you want to do assertions in release builds. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Managed 程式碼中的判斷提示](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code)。For more information, see [Assertions in Managed Code](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code). 一般而言，方法用來在程式開發期間識別出邏輯錯誤。Typically, the method is used to identify logic errors during program development. 評估條件。 evaluates the condition. 如果結果為`false`、方法呼叫和`detailMessageFormat`字串和`args`陣列會在當做參數傳遞。If the result is `false`, The method is called and the `detailMessageFormat` string and `args` array are passed in as parameters. 然後會傳送指定的文字訊息和格式化的文字訊息集合。 then sends the specified text message and the formatted text message to the collection. 您可以自訂此行為，藉由新增，或移除，集合。You can customize this behavior by adding a to, or removing one from, the collection. 當應用程式在使用者介面模式下執行時，它會顯示訊息方塊，顯示帶有檔案和行號的呼叫堆疊。When the application runs in user interface mode, it displays a message box that shows the call stack with file and line numbers. 訊息方塊包含三個按鈕：**中止**，**重試**，和**忽略**。The message box contains three buttons: **Abort**, **Retry**, and **Ignore**. 按一下**中止**按鈕結束應用程式。Clicking the **Abort** button terminates the application. 按一下**重試**如果您的應用程式正在執行中偵錯工具，或詢問您是否要開啟偵錯工具，如果不是傳送至偵錯工具中的程式碼。Clicking **Retry** sends you to the code in the debugger if your application is running in a debugger, or offers to open a debugger if it is not. 按一下**忽略**會繼續進行下一個指令碼中。Clicking **Ignore** continues with the next instruction in the code. > [!NOTE] > 顯示訊息方塊是取決於是否存在。The display of the message box is dependent on the presence of the . 如果不在集合，訊息方塊不會顯示。If the is not in the collection, the message box is not displayed. 可以移除[<清除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)、 [<移除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)，或藉由呼叫方法屬性 (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`)。The can be removed by the [<clear>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), the [<remove>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), or by calling the method on the property (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`). 您可以變更的行為對應至您的應用程式名稱的組態檔中。You can change the behavior of the in the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此檔案中，您可以啟用和停用判斷提示訊息方塊或設定屬性。In this file, you can enable and disable the assert message box or set the property. 組態檔的格式應該如下：The configuration file should be formatted as follows: ```xml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用.NET framework 物件的值轉換成它的文字表示，並將該表示內嵌在字串中。This method uses the of the .NET Framework to convert the value of an object to its text representation and embed that representation in a string. 這個方法的語法中的關鍵字表示的物件陣列可以是單一值。The keyword in the syntax for this method implies that the object array can be a single value. 這個例外狀況是物件。The exception to this is the object. 明確的多載會接受優先順序，因此`arg`單一字串值將會預設為多載。Explicit overloads take precedence, so an `arg` value of a single string will default to the overload. 根據預設，輸出會寫入執行個體。By default, the output is written to an instance of . 這個方法會呼叫追蹤接聽項的方法。This method calls the method of the trace listener.
